p: It is important to increase food production and achieve a self-sufficiency level (SSL) for a growing country to become an advanced country. Currently, the agro-food crops in tropical countries comprise of grains, organic fruits and vegetables, herbs and spices, livestock and fisheries [ 232, 234]. By referring to some of the applications stated in Section 3.1, Section 3.2 and Section 3.3, optics and photonic techniques can once again improve the overall quality and yield of these crops.
